summary: Recolored the snow dragon to look more like the White from D&D.
descriptionHtml:
Next in my series of D&D dragon recolors. This one, obviously, is the White dragon. Having some issues on whether this color is okay, or if it should be more grey than white. 
Basically, he looks awesome in screenshots, but depending on your ingame settings(and weather), he might be TOO white. But then again, snow can be blindingly white in the sun as well, so I dunno.  Let me know what you guys/ladies think.

This recolor replaces the \'dragon_snow.dds\'.

Unzip to Data/Textures/Actors/Dragon.
author: LoganGFX
